title: (x) chiseled script on Neil Young album liner - Ovidius {Dav}
content:
Hi folks…

Looking for something similar to this text (from a Neil Young album liner).  
Want something extra-chiselled like this “like a sailor’s journal entry written in fountain pen.”

Any thoughts?

Thanks,  
Pru

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CDinsert.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=CDinsert.jpg) | 24.58 KB |
author: dark_ink

comments.content:
_Something like_ ‘ [Dalliance](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=87)’ _( Script )_, _by Frank Heine / Emigre_, _maybe_.?  
_( Or even ‘ [Zanzibar](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/catalogue_index.asp)’ / ‘ [Incognito](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=FOT0000074)’, by Gábor Kóthay / Fountain.? )_

_( Edit-a-bit.: Some more.: ‘ [Autograph](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-autograph-script/)’, ‘ [Carpenter](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/TW10100.cfm)’, ‘ [Chatham](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/Chatham.html)’, ‘ [Constitution](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.linotype.com/48703/linotypeconstitutionregular-font.html)’, ‘ [Dearest](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/dearest.html)’, ‘ [Diva](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.canadatype.com/showfont.php?id=23)’, ‘ [Herencia](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts-herencia.htm)’, ‘ [Liorah](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/liorah/)’, ‘ [Ovidius](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/TS10100.cfm)’, ‘ [Roanoke](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/roanoke.html)’, ‘ [Sudestada](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111232104/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts-sudestada.htm)’.. )_

Thanks!

A lovely selection, but I think Ovidius is the one we’ll go with.

Cheers,  
Pru

I think Ovidius was the font used in the sample, so that’s a good choice. :)

- Mike Yanega
